endpoints.description: Generate a tailored emissions report based on the provided operational data inputs.
Retrieve details of a previously generated emissions report using its unique identifier.
Update an existing emissions report with new operational data or corrections.
Remove a previously generated emissions report from the system.
Upload operational data files for analysis and inclusion in emissions calculations.
Check the status of data currently being processed for emissions calculations.
Retrieve standardized carbon emission factors related to various activities within the energy sector.
Submit calculations for specific emissions scenarios using pre-defined factors.
List the current regulatory requirements related to emissions reporting applicable to the energy sector.
View user-defined sustainability targets and associated progress measures.
